translations.translation: but only as a reminder for those who have fear,
But as admonition for him who fears --
it is only a reminder for him who fears Allah;
for those who have fear (of disobeying God), not to make you, (Muhammad), miserable.
Except as a reminder for one who fears.
But only as a Reminder to those who fear (Allah).
Nay, it is a reminder to him who fears:
but only as a reminder to him who tears,
But as a reminder unto him who feareth,
but only as an exhortation for him who fears God;
But only as an admonition unto him who feareth. *Chapter: 20
but only as an admonition to him who fears [his Lord].
But only as an admonition to those who fear (Allah),-
But only as a Reminder to those who fear (Allah).
but as a reminder to he who fears.
But only as a reminder for him who fears.
But only as a reminder for those who fear [Allah] -
[20:3] but, We have revealed it, only to remind, therewith, him who fears, God;
(But as a reminder) an admonition (unto him who feareth) unto him who embraces Islam, and We have not revealed it to you in order that you tire yourself,

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text:
بل ما أنزلناه { إِلاَّ تَذْكِرَةً } للسعادة العظمة لك ولمن تبعك
 لا لكل أحدٍ مهم بل { لِّمَن يَخْشَىٰ } [طه: 3] من إنذاراته وتخويفاته
 وامتثل بأوامره
 واجتنب عن نواهيه
 إذ أنزل القرآن عليك من عموم رحمتنا على كافة الخلق

commentaries.author: ابن عجيبة
commentaries.text:
و { إلاَّ تذكرة }: مفعول لأجله
 والاستثناء منقطع
 أي: ما أنزلناه لتتعب به
 لكن أنزلناه للتذكرة والوعظ
